import React, { PureComponent } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import "../invoice/invoicenone.css"; class Productcreate extends PureComponent { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { type:' ', name:' ', sku:' ', unit:' ', hsn_code:' ', quantity:' ', selling_price:' ', description:' ', taxable:' ', rate:' ', active:false, tax:[] } } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } taxchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value,active:!this.state.active}) } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let tax={ name:this.state.rate.slice(0,4), rate:this.state.rate.slice(4,6) } /*axios.post("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/inventory/tax/?ordering=created_at",tax) .then(res => { console.log(res); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) })*/ const data={ type:this.state.type, name:this.state.name, sku:this.state.sku, unit:this.state.unit, hsn_code:this.state.hsn_code, quantity:this.state.quantity, selling_price:this.state.selling_price, description:this.state.description, taxable:this.state.taxable, tax:this.state.tax } console.log(data); /*axios.post("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/inventory/product/?ordering=created_at",data) .then(res => { console.log(res); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); })*/ } componentDidMount() { axios.get("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/inventory/tax/?ordering=created_at") .then(res => { this.setState({tax:res.data}) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } render() { return (

New Product

{console.log(this.state.tax.length)}
) } } export default Productcreate
